title: Short Stories for Early Readers: 17 Stories in 1
description: This is a fun bundle of short stories with lovable characters who are eager to learn and grow. These stories are perfect for all ages, however are designed for early readers learning to expand their reading skills and vocabulary. Packed full of lessons and morals for growing boys and girls, and ready to ready now!!Parents will love the lessons their children learn from these stories!Check it out and see for yourself.** Click "Buy Now with 1 click" to reserve your copy forever**
author: Betty J. Byers
